Chinese.Description: 较大体型的蜈蚣有几率在追击玩家时出现闪烁蓝白光的效果，几秒后会对所有靠近蜈蚣的手持有普通长矛/电矛的玩家造成电击眩晕，但普通长矛将会转化为电矛，未充能的电矛将完成充能

English.Description: Larger centipedes have a chance to flash blue-white when chasing the player, and after a few seconds will stun all players who are close to the centipede holding a normal spear/electric spear, but the normal spear will be converted to an electric spear, and the uncharged electric spear will be fully charged
